text: Kuma idan kun kasance a kan tafiya, kuma ba ku sami marubuci ba, to, a bayar da jingina karɓaɓɓiya (ga hannu). To, idan sashenku ya amince wa sashe, to, wanda aka amince wannan sai ya bayar da amanarsa, kuma ya bi Allah, Ubangijinsa, da taƙawa. Kuma kada ku ɓoye shaida, kuma wanda ya ɓoye ta, to, shi mai zunubin zuciyarsa ne. KumaAllah ga abin da kuke aikatawa Masani ne
